body: Hi All, Following are some images from Sunlight light hour analysis. I wonder why am I getting shading for buildings in the northern part of site if the sun is not going behind them. Can anyone point out what am I doing wrong here please? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3oOh0daNY6ML-WIXiGwBLmsCOvlvJebruPwvwkEL2rekjM-kDpl2ppndvgP9ZXH*bLoe7iPpQJf4cJGHFlvSEDe6HrkZ8-Pr/SunlightHours.jpg) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3oOh0daNY6PojoYkzU5Td5ZAFOTnKe71io*H1yQK841fBidWxYWmn9xI7Xb8SxFBitua8vqsiSVvNOQH626-aZLzsxN54grK/ViewFromSun.jpg) -Devang
